answers.answer: Congrats! Your baby is doing great! Am 32wks and my baby barely weight 3 lbs she has UIGR so she is going to be small baby, but healthy♡God willing♡
At 30 weeks 3 days my baby measured 3 lbs13 oz. They said that's about normal
How do Y'all know exactly?  By ultrasound?
At my last ultrasound I was 34 weeks and 3 days and my baby weighed 4 pounds 8 oz.
that about right, i had my son (who is 9 now) at 30.3 weeks and he weight 3.15lbs. congrats :-)
When i was 33 weeks my bb weighed 5lbs 3oz. Im 36 weeks now n idk how much he weighs until my 39th week u/s
At 29+3 my lil man was 3lbs 9ozs. I'm now 29+6 and go back to the Dr Monday to have his measurements and weight done.
At my 30 weeks appt last week my son estimated weight was 4 lbs 5 ozs!!
My little one is about as long as 33weeks but she is small and about the overall size of a 29/30 week old.. She was growing so fast to start with and has slowed down a bit now at 33 weeks

At 33 weeks my baby was weighting 6 lbs, at 99% percentil of growth. I will be having another ultrasound on the 28th to check the weight again!!! I posted before about macrosomic babies...congratulations on your baby!!!
I am 30 weeks I Got an ultrasound yesterday my daughter is 3lbs 15oz!!

I'm 30+6days. I had to have a scan as I have gestational diabetes my baby measuring 5lbs  I have to be induced 36-37wks  as baby will just be too big come due date...  I'm only little.myself so it's crazy that I'm carrying a baby hippo lol still all being well and healthy can't wait to meet her earlier
Aw congrats to all you ladies! :)

question: 30+1 day and baby is measuring 3 1/2 pounds already! How about any other moms around this time?
title: Size of your baby??
